channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Passster
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Passster

item.title: CVE-2022-3206|2024-08-03T01:00:10.811Z -- unknown -- passster
item.description: The Passster WordPress plugin before 3.5.5.5.2 stores the password inside a cookie named "passster" using base64 encoding method which is easy to decode. This puts the password at risk in case the cookies get leaked.
